name: COVID-19 - Johns Hopkins University
title: COVID-19 - Johns Hopkins University
description: Raw data on confirmed cases and deaths for all countries is sourced from the COVID-19 Data Repository by the Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE) at Johns Hopkins University. Our complete COVID-19 dataset is a collection of the COVID-19 data maintained by Our World in Data. It is updated daily and includes data on confirmed cases, deaths, hospitalizations, and testing. We have created a new description of all our data sources. You find it at our GitHub repository here. There you can download all of our data.
